column4: Hey. When starting Audacity, I get this error: "Error initializing the audio i/o layer. \n You will not be able to play or record audio. \n Error: Host error." Does anyone know what I can do to fix this? My microphone doesn't work on Skype either, but I'm not sure if those two things are related. I haven't yet been able to use my Mike In on my soundcard yet.
audacity doesn't play nice with rsd
I don't get output from killall, and Audacity still won't work
you wouldn't get output from killall esd
is skype running? If so, get rid of it
I think something is hogging your sound device
it works now. But can't I run Audacity and Skype simultaneous?
ah, that's sad. Isn't there a workaround?
there's a sound grabber hack someone did to fool skype
I'll see if I can find a mixer
skype is closed source so we can't really do much about it
blue89 said I could search for a software audio mixer
might be something on the skype wiki page about it
